title: Saving Grace
description: Divorced and pregnant, Grace Hudson thinks that her life cannot get any more complicated. She finds out how wrong she is when someone tries to kill her. With the help of a kind Samaritan, she manages to survive her ordeal. When her uncle, the Chief of Police, finds out, he hires bodyguard Matt Bolton to protect her. While Matt watches over Grace, he finds himself developing feelings for her. As he fights his feelings the police work to catch Grace's attacker. Will the attacker be caught and will Matt give in to his feelings?
author: Kate  Hopkins
